body: Certainly something I'd consider adding should enough people want it or I receive a pull request for it :-)

-1 sorry

IMHO purpose of rclone seems to be to store and retrieve data that sits
behind Application Programming Interface(API).

On Mon, Jul 11, 2016 at 5:42 PM erse80 notifications@github.com wrote:

> +1
> 
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/ncw/rclone/issues/540#issuecomment-231874620, or mute
> the thread
> https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe/AGXRY2oB7GTUOmcPW_Y0r7dYK5qRjuXUks5qUri9gaJpZM4I6XJj
> .

+1

We use rclone to move big data from ftp to object storage. At the moment we have to mount the ftp server with fusefs as a local file system. The performance is not good, it would be much better to have rclone able to speak FTP

+1

There are many scientific datasets stored on ftp servers right now, and they might stay there for "legacy" reasons. However, having a copy on a cloud storage would allow new applications to be written more cloud-friendly and help the migration from filesystem based data management to API-based.

I think FTP sits well with rclone.  The trouble with it is that it is a rather loosely defined protocol and the whole control channel & data channel thing will make rclone's life more complicated.  The first thing to do would be to evaluate the various FTP client libraries available.

@nick

Would you like a list of available ftp libraries in a spreadsheet format or
CSV is okay? Also, what column names do you prefer for the available
libraries?

On Thu, Jul 14, 2016, 7:42 AM Nick Craig-Wood notifications@github.com
wrote:

In the this issue [as a table](https://help.github.com/articles/organizing-information-with-tables/) would be perfect.  Don't mind about column names.  Thanks in advance!

| Path | Synopsis |
| --- | --- |
| github.com/jlaffaye/ftp | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/deuill/sleepy/core/server | Package server contains the core server functionality for Sleepy, including the RPC service, the embedded HTTP server for files uploaded via Sleepy, and an FTP server, containing a subset of functionality required for uploading files to Sleepy in an efficient manner. |
| github.com/smira/aptly/http | Package http provides all HTTP (and FTP)-related operations |
| github.com/mingzhi/hgt/genome/report | This package is to retreive prokaryotes information from the folder of GENOME_REPORTS in NCBI ftp. |
| github.com/yob/graval | An experimental FTP server framework. |
| github.com/smira/go-ftp-protocol/protocol | Package protocol implements ftp:/â€‹/â€‹ scheme plugin for http.Transport |
| github.com/remogatto/ftpget | Fetch files from FTP |
| bitbucket.org/zombiezen/ftp | Package ftp provides a minimal FTP client as defined in RFC 959. |
| github.com/goftp/ftp | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/felixge/go-ardrone/net/ftp | Package ftp provides ftp access to the ardrone. |
| github.com/â€‹dabamos/â€‹openadms/â€‹monitoring/â€‹module/â€‹transfer/â€‹ftp | Package ftp provides a module to transfer files via ftp. |
| github.com/â€‹MG-RAST/â€‹Shock/â€‹vendor/â€‹github.com/â€‹jum/â€‹tinyftp | Package tinyftp implements a small subset of FTP, enough to retrieve directory listings and files (including resume support). |
| github.com/mezzato/ftp4go | Package ftp implements an FTP client. |
| github.com/secsy/goftp | Package goftp provides a high-level FTP client for go. |
| github.com/MDrollette/ftp4go | Package ftp implements an FTP client. |
| github.com/jum/tinyftp | Package tinyftp implements a small subset of FTP, enough to retrieve directory listings and files (including resume support). |
| github.com/shenshouer/ftp4go | Package ftp implements an FTP client. |
| github.com/SoCloz/ftp | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/stacktic/ftp | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/onbings/ftpsclient | Package FtpsClient implements a basic ftp(s) client which can be used to connect an application to a ftp server. |
| github.com/justscu/goftp/ftp | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/gonutz/ftp-client/ftp | Package ftp implements the FTP client protocol as specified in RFC 959. |
| github.com/smallfish/ftp | FTP Client For Go(lang) |
| gopkg.in/jlaffaye/ftp.v0 | Package ftp implements a FTP client as described in RFC 959. |
| github.com/shiyanlou/golang-ftp-client | www.shiyanlou.com project course |

Most welcome :)

issue.title: Support for FTP backend

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
Hi all,

this is preliminary work to add FTP support, as per issue #540. It is not perfect, and doc is still missing, but I would like to have someone to play with it already because I'm not that familiar with Go.

Also, I've tested with vsftpd and it works (both anonymous and user/password access), but for some reason it doesn't work with, e.g., ftp.kernel.org.
